amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding for Capital and Debt Service Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation by $861,500,000.

action.text: Mr. Diaz-Balart raised a point of order against the Brown (FL) amendment (A021). Mr. Diaz-Balart stated that the amendment seeks to cause a net increase in budget authority in violation of the provisions of H. Res. 5. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. Brown (FL).
